title: Mike Tomlin Speaks
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss the Commander’s toxic workplace Congressional hearing taking place, The latest on players waiting for new deals, the outlook of the Cowboy’s offense this season, Mike Tomlin’s newsworthy comments, and we remember Ravens’ linebacker Jaylon Ferguson who sadly passed away. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Mike Tomlin comments on may aspects of the Steelers and the Commander's Congressional hearing starts.
